description: A government-exclusive waterway that connects major World Government facilities including Enies Lobby, Impel Down, and Marine Headquarters. The current flows in a circular pattern through the Calm Belt.

keyEvents.title: Escaped Prisoners Travel to Marine Headquarters
keyEvents.description: The escaped prisoners from Impel Down celebrate their freedom while traveling via the Tarai Current toward Marine Headquarters aboard a hijacked Marine vessel.
keyEvents.significance: The use of the government's own waterway by escaped prisoners symbolizes the magnitude of the Impel Down breakout and foreshadows the chaos at Marineford.

keyEvents.title: Buggy's Past Revealed to Prisoners
keyEvents.description: While traveling on the Tarai Current, a Marine officer's transmission reveals Buggy's legendary past to all the escaped prisoners.
keyEvents.significance: This location becomes the setting for a pivotal moment in Buggy's rise to power.

statusHistory.reason: The Tarai Current continues to function as a government waterway

name.japanese: 海軍本部（マリンフォード）

description: The headquarters of the Marines, located in Paradise near the Red Line. It serves as the main base of operations for the World Government's military forces and the execution site for Portgas D. Ace.

keyEvents.title: Ace Arrives at Marine Headquarters
keyEvents.description: Portgas D. Ace arrives at Marineford with only three hours until his scheduled execution. He is escorted to the gallows as final preparations for the war begin.
keyEvents.significance: Ace's arrival marks the beginning of the Marineford War, one of the most significant events in One Piece history. The stage is set for a massive battle that will reshape the world.

keyEvents.title: Escaped Prisoners Decide to Go to Marineford
keyEvents.description: Buggy convinces the escaped Impel Down prisoners to head to Marine Headquarters, setting up their arrival at the battlefield.
keyEvents.significance: This decision brings numerous powerful prisoners to Marineford, adding chaos to an already volatile situation.

statusHistory.reason: Marine Headquarters is operational and preparing for the Marineford War

name.japanese: インペルダウン - LEVEL4 焦熱地獄
name.romanized: Inperu Daun - Reberu Fō Shōnetsu Jigoku

description: Level 4 of Impel Down, known as Blazing Hell. A floor characterized by intense heat from a massive cauldron of boiling blood. This level houses prisoners with bounties between 50-99 million berries.

keyEvents.title: Shiryu Saves Blackbeard Pirates
keyEvents.description: On Level 4, Shiryu provides antidotes to save Blackbeard and his crew from Magellan's poison.
keyEvents.significance: This location serves as the setting for a crucial moment in Blackbeard's raid and Shiryu's recruitment.

keyEvents.title: Shiryu Joins Blackbeard on Level 4
keyEvents.description: After saving the crew, Shiryu officially joins the Blackbeard Pirates on Level 4 of Impel Down.
keyEvents.significance: This marks a major turning point for both Shiryu and the Blackbeard Pirates.

statusHistory.reason: Level 4 sustained damage during the massive breakout led by Luffy and Blackbeard
